text: sach robsa vea ning chheam robsa vea teangoasa min ach towdl a l laoh laey kabonde kar kaotakhlach( a l laoh) ampi puok anak te del ach towdl trong noh . dauchnaoh der trong ban bangkeut vea chea br- yoch samreab puok anak daembi aoy puok anak leukatamkeung a l laoh tow leu avei del trong ban changaoulobangheanh dl puok anak . haey chaur anak ( mou ham meat) phdal damnoeng rikreay dl banda anak del sang ampeula
